title: Hi! I want to report this guy " name_removed " for being so toxic and having a negative attitude!
body:
Hi! I'm writing this to let you guys know that the account have the name " _name_removed_ " have being so toxic in this game, in the ban pick section, someone ban his champ Master Yi because they weren't pay attention to him, and at that time, he being so toxic about he one who ban his champ, he pick Xerath for no reason and he started to trolling and blaming us, he not even play for the whole game and make us so angry, this is when we decide to open mid because there is no change to win. I hope you guys have some penalty with this guy because he might have this attitude in future. 
Thanks for reading!!!

replies.body:
Hey LazersHD,

Really sucks what happened in that game and you're right to want him reported, but it's actually against the [board rules](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules) to report people by name on the boards. That's why I've removed the name of the player you mentioned in your post.

 The best place to report is in the end-game lobby by clicking the report player button, or if you think this case is particularly serious or might not be detected, then you can submit your report directly to Riot through a [Riot Support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Make sure you submit your report in the _"Report cheating, phishing, or negative in-game behavior"_ category.
